thread.title: Manchester United transfer news: Antoine Griezmann boost as Arsenal target Alexandre Lacazette could join Atletico Madrid | Metro News
thread.title_full: Manchester United transfer news: Antoine Griezmann boost as Arsenal target Alexandre Lacazette could join Atletico Madrid | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Manchester United transfer news: Antoine Griezmann boost as Arsenal target Alexandre Lacazette could join Atletico Madrid | Metro News
text:
Manchester United get Antoine Griezmann transfer boost from Arsenal target Alexandre Lacazette gossip Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Thursday 23 Feb 2017 11:08 pm Antoine Griezmann’s form continues to spark rumours of huge interest (Picture: Getty) 
Manchester United could be handed a huge boost in their pursuit of the transfer of Antoine Griezmann as Arsenal target Alexandre Lacazette could replace him at Atletico Madrid. Keep smiling! Mourinho of all people melts hearts with touching message to Ranieri 
The Lyon striker is being lined up to fill any potential void left by his fellow Frenchman at the Vicente Calderon, with United strongly linked with a summer move for the £85million forward. 
Griezmann has continued his fine goalscoring form this season, netting 17 times in all competitions to attract interest from a host of top clubs ahead of the next transfer window. Alexandre Lacazette could solve Atletico’s striker problem (Picture: Getty) Griezmann has been strongly linked with United (Picture: Getty)
